channel.title: [SRL] f2p Rune Buyer - With forms
channel.description:
[size=13pt][b]f2pRuneBuyer[/b] [/size]
What does it do? This script buys any F2P rune that you want from either Betty's Magic Emporium or Aubury's Rune Shop. Currently no world-switching(if I get good feedback on this script, next version will be with world-switching).
Features: -Antiban -MultiPlayer -Forms(Easy setup :)) -Works in either Betty's Magic Emporium or Aubury's Rune Shop -And the usual features that you would want a script like this to have.
How to setup? [size=9pt] -Make sure the specify a RS client -Declare the players in DeclarePlayers procedure(also make sure that all the users are in either Betty's Magic Emporium or Aubury's Rune Shop) -Click run -Edit the settings in the form to your liking -Press start, and your done[/size]
[B]If you download this script and use it, please post some feedback.[/B] I didn't save any progress reports, but the script worked fine for me for 12+ hours. Please post some progress reports or bugs that you find.

item.title: [SRL] f2p Rune Buyer - With forms
item.dc:creator: @bsballastro bsballastro
item.description:
@bsballastro wrote:

havent had time 2 try, i wuill when i get a chance, but can u put in a feature that only buys runes until the price raises to X amt. then it stops and logs out. then it logs back into a different world and repeats.

amazing job it worked perfectly right after i downloaded it

sly

item.title: [SRL] f2p Rune Buyer - With forms
item.dc:creator: @tim46 tim46
item.description:
@tim46 wrote:

[size=13pt]f2pRuneBuyer
[/size]

What does it do?
This script buys any F2P rune that you want from either Betty’s Magic Emporium or Aubury’s Rune Shop. Currently no world-switching(if I get good feedback on this script, next version will be with world-switching).

Features:
-Antiban
-MultiPlayer
-Forms(Easy setup :))
-Works in either Betty’s Magic Emporium or Aubury’s Rune Shop
-And the usual features that you would want a script like this to have.

How to setup?
[size=9pt] -Make sure the specify a RS client
-Declare the players in DeclarePlayers procedure(also make sure that all the users are in either Betty’s Magic Emporium or Aubury’s Rune Shop)
-Click run
-Edit the settings in the form to your liking
-Press start, and your done[/size]

If you download this script and use it, please post some feedback.
I didn’t save any progress reports, but the script worked fine for me for 12+ hours. Please post some progress reports or bugs that you find.

Read full topic
